name: MAGNET to a GUNFIGHT
description:
Created for ScoreSpace #18: Magnetic in 3 days!

You knew not to bring a knife to a gunfight, that would be foolish. Instead, you brought your trusty MAGNET!

Fight off an endless horde of fools, wielding guns and knifes. Use your magnet to take their weapons and use them to help you.

Compete for a highscore on the global leaderboard!

Controls:

  • WASD to MOVE
  • HOLD RIGHT CLICK to ATTRACT
  • HOLD LEFT CLICK to REPEL
  • ESCAPE to PAUSE

Credits:

  • Programming and 3d modeling - CodeRed
  • Music (created specifically for this game) - Keegan Clark
  • Title text made with Simple Helvetica - Studio Pepwuper
